title: Chicago Public Media to Acquire Chicago Sun-Times, Creating a Nonprofit Local-News Powerhouse
sub_head: Organizations expect the deal to close by the end of the month
body:
Tabloid journalism and public radio in the Midwest are poised to join forces.
The board of Chicago Public Media, the nonprofit that operates the city’s public radio station WBEZ, voted to acquire the Chicago Sun-Times, a legacy Midwestern daily tabloid.Chicago Public Media, the nonprofit that operates the city’s public radio station WBEZ, voted to acquire the Chicago Sun-Times, a legacy Midwestern daily tabloid.
